channel.title: Zennaro, M. on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Zennaro, M. on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Four stellar populations and extreme helium variation in the massive outer-halo globular cluster NGC 2419
item.description: A new economic combination of HST filter reveals the presence of four stellar populations with extreme Helium variations in the massive outer-halo globular cluster NGC2419.

item.title: Four stellar populations and extreme helium variation in the massive outer-halo globular cluster NGC 2419
item.description: The far-away massive cluster NGC2419 reveals interesting and extreme properties
